reviews.review:
A valve ja é famosa por fazer jogos incriveis, do mesmo jeito que é famosa por não fazer o 3° game de suas franquias.
Portal apareceu bem timido, porem impressiona assim que você começa a joga-lo, a ideia é simples, você usa portais para passar do ponto (A) pro ponto (B).

a Chell a protagonista do jogo não fala, porem o jogo sim tem historia, simples mas interessante, a GLados (inteligencia artificial) que faz a historia acontecer, testando a Chell e os testes vão ficando cada vez mais dificil

a mecanica do jogo é excelente ate por que é feita na engine do Half life 2, o grafico é bunitinho, nada que va ti desanimar e nada que va ti impressiona. se você jogou portal 2 primeiro não ache que vai tirar esse de letra, por que ele é bem mais dificil, vai ti fazer pensar mais vezes e tbm ira fazer vc ser rapido.

o jogo é muito bom e ta bem barato então se vc ta pensando se vai compra, pode subi a tela devolta, manda pro carrinho, compra logo esse jogo e vai se divertir por que vale muito a pena

Ich denk mal, Portal ist schon so sehr bekannt, dass ich nicht mehr viel erklären muss.
Richtig gutes Spiel.
Solo por la canción del final el juego ya merece dedito para arriba. Después simplemente es uno de los mejores juegos que vi en mi vida. 10/10
いいゾ～これ
Do I need to say anything? :D
non ho mai giocato un gioco migliore di questo (nel suo genere) NON ESISTONO COMMENTI NEGATIVI SU PORTAL. gioco eccezionale
good game
Gioco molto originale, vario e divertente.
Ladnie smiga nawet na starszym sprzecie! Gre polecam dla osob ktorzy lubia czasami lamiglowki!

This is a great game. The puzzles are amazing, with the later ones even providing multiple ways to use the portal mechanic to get past obstacles. This game is amusing and fun on a level most games never achieve. All that being said, I believe it is a bit overrated. After hearing people raving about how awesome it was for so long (and even owning it on Orange Box for PS3 years ago without ever having played it), I fianally decided to just jump in and find out what all the hype is about. It is fun and well worth the entry fee to play, but the total play through took me a Sunday morning. My play time that you see is how long it took me to beat the game and I really don't have much desire to go back and do it again or to do the extra trials on the same levels. The first half of the 19 challenges were brainlessly easy and basically just a tutorial on the mechanics leaving you with only a handful of actually (somewhat) challenging levels (and a bit more). The story is amusing and the whole package is well put together. All this being said, this game is fun and everyone should try it. I just don't see what all the fuss is about and why there are so many fanboys out there acting like it this is the best thing ever created in the gaming industry. It is a great game and fun to play through, but there are  lot of those out there. Worth the $10 (or less if you can catch it on sale)? Absolutely! Worth the hype and people running around with their hair on fire with a portal shirt on? Questionable......
Zajebistość w procentach hmm... 10000/10 oczywiście ta gra ma ju,ż pare lat

Juego entretenido,lleno de niveles faciles medios y hardoretas que te daran mas de un quiebro de cabeza para poder pasartelo.
Graficamente no puede competir con los juegos actuales pero bastante decente, la historia es bastante normal para mi gusto algo corta ya que el juego te lo pasas en unas 3/4 horas.... aunque  para conseguir todos los logros se le dedicaran algunas mas 
bastante  recomendable =)

포탈2가 그렇게 창의적이고 신박한 게임이라기에 크리스마스? 신년 게임 세일 떄 번들로 질렀습니다
과연 명성이 허명이 아니었네요 ㅎㅎ, 다만 인터페이스 음성이 영어로만 나와서 알아들을 수 없었던 점이 아쉽습니다.

As a noted classic and must play by just about every gamer I've seen on the PC side of things, I figured I had to give it a shot as it seemed to be an interesting premise for a game. 

This game is unlike any other I've played before. As someone used to mostly FPS and the occasional RPG this was a fun escape from all the usual stuff. Fun, addicting, and really well done. If you're looking for something new and haven't played this yet then you should go ahead and buy and enjoy it. 

Looking forward to starting Portal 2.

10/10 Única coisa ruim é ter a campanha curta, levei 3 horas pra zerar pq eu so burra1, pessoas normais levam de               40 min~1 hora pra zerar


EU APRUVEES
Jogo de puzzle muito divertido e bem interessante. O lado negativo é para quem tem facilidade com puzzles, pois pode decepcionar-se pelo fato do game ser curto.

Portal es un juego de puzzles que no deja de tener acción. Crea un equilibrio perfecto entre suspenso y reflexión, llevando al jugador a buscar la resolución de un problema mientras se perturba con los lugares escalofriantes que puede ir encontrando. Algo malo pueden ser los niveles finales, que se tornan tediosos y aburridos después de un tiempo. Pese a eso, es un juego muy recomendado para los amantes de los juegos tipo "mazmorras", y siento que aproveché cada centavo que invertí en él. Una obra casi perfecta.
I really enjoyed this game and Portal 2.

Ya reclamé mi torta :D 

Es un juego muy bien trabajado, desde cada escenario donde se ven puzzles "imposibles" ya que uno no tiene en cuenta algunos aspectos de gravedad y reflejo pero llegando a usar la imaginacíon se logra hacer,  algo muy diferente a lo que uno viene acostumbrado a ver. El juego es corto pero vale mucho la pena tenerlo, hasta la canción de los creditos es genial jaja

I honestly didn't think I'd like a game about going in and out of shiny circles and stacking boxes, but I did, I really did. Made me actually think. Having played COD for so long I though I'd never regain full capacity of my frontal lobe, but it's back, baby. I finally got me somes smarticles. 

#Gladosisbae4lyfe.

Very good game design! Beginners may easily get confused by the mechanism, but once you understand how the game goes, it gets very interesting! The game essentially requires a 4-dimensional mind to solve the puzzles. Some puzzles even test your  control abilities! All in all a very good game.
This is a classic and i love it, I recommend this
Still a great offline one player stratagy game.
Great thinking game to play!
Es un excelente juego, es bastante corta la campaña pero divierte mucho  10/10

Portal é um jogo bem divertido, que te faz quebrar a cabeça pra resolver os puzzles.

A história no começo fica meio vaga, mas só no final é que você realmente entende o que está acontecendo. No começo os puzzles são simples, mas quanto mais você avança, esses puzzles vão dificultando e tornando-se cada vez mais longos.

A mecânica dos portais é feito de uma maneira bastante inteligente e que usa uma lógica real. O único ponto negativo é que ele é curtinho.

入口を２つ作れる銃があり撃った場所に入口を作ることができるのですがその２つの入口はどんな場所につくろうとつながるのでワープできることになります。そんな銃を活かしながらパズルのように実験施設を進んでいくゲームです。
主人公は足にバネのような特殊な器具をつけてるので高いところから落ちても平気です。なのでかなり浮遊感あふれるアクションとなっており酔います。例えば地面に２つ入口を作っておき高いところから飛び込むと入った勢いで上に飛び上がり、落下し、入った勢いで上に飛び上がり、落下し、を繰り返すことになります。もちろん重力も向きが変化するのでカメラの向きが変わったりします。落下する浮遊感から頂点に達したときカメラの向きがくるっと変わったら、これがとてつもなく酔うんです。
ただ酔う感覚もこのゲーム面白いとこなので多少我慢しながら吐かないとこまで酔ってみましょう。とても気持ちが悪いですｗｗｗ
自分以外はかなりが無機物なのでそんな中で閉じ込められている感覚はかなりホラーな感じもしましたね。もうホラーパズルＦＰＳと言った方がいいんじゃないか。
とても酔いましたがシステム、ストーリーやグラフィックどれをとっても良く面白い作品でした。Portal2をプレイしてみようと思います。

I've always enjoyed this game, but I can't help feel it's a TAD overrated. I enjoy the GLAdOS character, the secret Rattman dens, and of course, the puzzles. But it's like this game is missing something. Maybe it's just because it's so short, but it seems to lack substance, almost like a Victoria Secret model. Sure, she has a pretty face, and a charming demeanor, but you can't help but notice how thin she is. It's not healthy.
Brings back childhood memories
Main story only takes about 3 hours but there's more advanced maps to play after.

早前在某视频里看到传送门的片段，当时想这游戏玩法好神奇。然后当我入了传送门包点开玩的时候，哦！根本停不下来！白天有时候还在想某一关究竟要怎么过！
PS：结尾的歌好评！这些天已被洗脑~~
decent game, quite buggy in places.  Not very clear paths specailly at the end test.  Good game though.  My brain hurts.....

Portal is a great game.  Enough said.  Oh ok, I'll go into some more detail.  The aim of Portal is to complete test chambers by using your portal gun (A.K.A. The Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device).  The device can pick things up and put things down.  For example you might pick up a box and drop it onto a turret clobbering it and obliterating it.  Poor turret, they seemed so nice.  Finally, of course, this is why it is called a portal device, it can shoot two different types of portal (one entrance portal and one exit portal).  

You need to complete test chambers by doing what needs to be done inside of it, like putting boxes on buttons and using portals to get across obstacles, and exiting it alive only, however, to do another one.  In most test chambers there are obstacles like turrets that you need to avoid.  Other wise they will look at you, point a laser at you and open fire upon you with their powerful machine guns.  How ever, some of the turrets can not be so clever.  They might shoot at you even if there is a big pane of glass in the way.  That is very annoying because the mess up the glass so that you can not see through it.

Story wise, Portal doesn't have a very long one.  In fact, it's really short.  When I say really short I mean really really short.  It only has nineteen test chambers and five other levels that take place after the test chambers.  How ever it is still a fun game.  But a game that you won't spend too long playing but I still recommend it.  An evil robot called GLaDOS is forcing you to do the test chambers.  She is crazy.  Her only job in life is to test and test and test over and over again.  She will do this to test subject after test subject after test subject.  For those test subjects there is no last test chamber, unless they die of course.  Oh great, you may be thinking.  Don't worry, it's only a game.  Anyway, for them, the test chambers just keep on coming.  However you, Chell, are something different.  You can think outside of the box and in some levels even outside of the test chamber.  Quite literally.

I would rate the game 90/100 however I am ignoring the fact that the game is so short.  Now the time has come for you to pay attention.  All I've been telling you to do in this review is to GET THE GAME!  If you follow this order (GET THE GAME!) your life will become so much better for about eight hours of playing Portal.  This game has been rated overwhelmingly positive (when this review was written and I doubt it will ever change from overwhelmingly positive) for crying out loud.  JUST GET IT!

Well done, Android.
The enrichment center would like to remind you that Android Hell is a very real place where you will be sent at the first sign of defiance.

11/10 would betray Companion Cube again

Great game. The initial rooms are dead easy, and in the later rooms it's easy to die. Learning to "think with Portals" is tricky  and the puzzles do keep stretching your problem solving skills, and of course, the dry humour keeps you from getting *too* frustrated.

My biggest bugbear with Portal is that one of the main mechanics gives me wicked motion sickness - as you jump through one portal, you're spat out from the other at the same speed, which can have an interesting effect on the camera! Not everyone will have this problem but I do recommend taking a break frequently, particularly if rollercoasters are NOT your thing.

That said, Portal is a little gem that will keep you entertained.

Qué decir de un clásico con una dinámica de juego imitada y hecha tributo tantas veces. desde los juegos flash hasta en juegos como el "Darksiders 2" por ejemplo. Sin duda un título a tener en cuenta con un sistema de juego tan sencillo y con tantas posibilidades que en seguida te haces fan y te haces ocn la 2ª parte y deseas ferviertemente la existencia de una tercera.

Расстроило лишь то, что первая часть очень уж короткая, да и сама Глэд не так прекрасна, как хотелось бы и как мы видим ее во второй части. Песенка в конце на титрах растрогала до глубины души. Солнышко просто, а не робот. <3

Bardzo fajna gra ( moim zdaniem oparta na filmie ,,Cube 2" ) ciekawa, śmieszna fabuła. W grze jest zadbany każdy szczegół co od razu widać po rozpoczęciu tej gry. Gra wydaje mi się troszeczkę krótka ale myśle że Portal 2 to nadrobi :D

我不得不说，这个游戏做的相当不错，对电脑配置的要求也不那么高，从游戏角度上来说，游戏的多样性和各种机关的巧妙结合都使得这款游戏变得更加有趣味，我个人非常推荐这款游戏，唯一的缺陷就是可能刚开始接触这一类游戏的玩家会在通过传送门的时候产生头晕的现象，不过习惯就好了

Si te levantas despues de un sueño inducido en una habitacion rara y con una voz hablándote, que esperas? un abrazo de un ser humano? una taza de café? amigos? Pues no! en Aperture laboratories creemos que la mejor forma de recibirte es con nuestra carismática y encantadora robot, GlaDos, ella te guiara a traves de un seguido de pruebas [strike]LETALES[/strike]. Recorre cámaras y cámaras, dispara portales, destruye torretas, jugetea con mortales láseres, experimenta el mareo al usar los portales... pero sobretodo, recuerda, todo esto lo hacemos por la CIENCIA!

Lo recomiendo personalmente
got game sickness from it, but very good game
